zh.HowToPlayText1:
《Among Us》是一个关于团队合作与背叛的游戏。

玩家分别会扮演船员和伪装者。
zh.HowToPlayText2: 在线或通过区域无线网与 4 至 15 名玩家一起游玩！
zh.HowToPlayText41: 游戏的主持人可以决定游玩的方式。
zh.HowToPlayText42:
首先要决定和谁一起游玩！

如果您想和好友在线游玩，设置为“私人”然后分享房间代码给好友即可。

如果您想和世界各地的玩家一起游玩，就设为“公开”。
zh.HowToPlayText43: 想要加入更多任务、加快行走速度，或添加更多伪装者？作为主持人，这些设置都可更改。不过要记得先和玩家同伴们确认这些更改。
zh.HowToPlayText44: 如果有人不礼貌或滥发信息，主持人可以将玩家暂时踢出以示警告，也可以封禁玩家进入特定线上房间。
zh.HowToPlayTextMap: 玩家拥有一张属于自己的地图，以便在船上四处移动。
zh.HowToPlayTextCrew1: 目标：将团队任务计量条填满或者找出伪装者。
zh.HowToPlayTextCrew2: 完成任务来填充计量条。
zh.HowToPlayTextCrew4: 发现伪装者时召集紧急会议。
zh.HowToPlayTextCrew6: 查看管理室地图和保安系统来寻找可疑行动。
zh.HowToPlayTextImp7: 在冷却的空档杀光船员。
zh.HowToPlayText5:
为了维持船员和伪装者双方的公平性，面对面游玩时不能说话。

如果有玩家被伪装者杀死，该玩家在游戏结束前都不能说话。

幽灵仍需继续进行自己分配到的任务，为船员阵营争取胜利。
zh.HowToPlayText6:
有人报告发现尸体或召集紧急会议时，船员们将聚在一起讨论关于伪装者的已知信息。

玩家这时可以开诚布公地说出自己怀疑谁是伪装者，以及自己有什么信息。在面对面游玩时，由于幽灵已经知道谁是伪装者，所以不能说话。

伪装者必须试着证明自己的无辜，或是指控其他船员。
zh.HowToPlayText7:
讨论过后，就把票投给您认为是伪装者的人。

得到最多票的人会遭到驱逐离开飞船，所以要审慎投票！

如果您没有足够的信息，而且其他船员也都这么认为，则可以跳过投票来避免放逐无辜组员，然后收集更多情报。
zh.HowToPlayText81: 在练习模式下训练一下！
zh.HowToPlayText82: 您可以设置作为船员的任务或扮演伪装者来演练杀戮计划！
zh.LocalHelp:
遇到连线问题？

● 请确认全员都已连接到名称相同的 WiFi
●请确保所有人的游戏版本相同（详见右下角）
● 确认您的 WiFi 信号强度足够
● 有时换个人来主持能协助解决问题
● 有时重启应用程序能协助解决问题...
● 有时重启手机也能协助解决问题...
● 问题还没解决怎么办？请通过 support@innersloth.com 与我们联系！
zh.OnlineHelp:
如何使用？

● 主持游戏时，在大厅面板旁边会显示一组游戏代码。
● 与好友分享这组游戏代码来创建私人房间。
● 也可点击“私人”将房间公开，以在“搜索游戏”检索。
● 可聊天时，主持人可以将玩家封禁或踢出。
● 问题还没解决怎么办？请通过 support@innersloth.com 与我们联系！

zh.AdPolicyText: 我们可以使用您的个人数据为您定制广告吗？如果单击“是”，那么我们的广告合作伙伴（例如 Google AdMob 和 Unity Ads）将自动收集数据，并使用设备标识符和 Cookie 推荐个性化广告。如果单击“否”，那么您可能仍会看到非个性化广告。若要移除所有广告，请在[httpstore]这里[]购买无广告升级，这样在您主持游戏时，您和好友就完全看不到广告！如需详细了解我们和广告合作伙伴的隐私处理方法，请查看我们的[https://www.innersloth.com/zh/privacy-policy-chinese/]隐私政策[]。您可以随时在“设置”菜单的“数据”下更改您的决定。
zh.PrivacyPolicyText:
《Among Us》的数据由 Innersloth 进行处理。请阅读我们的<link='https://www.innersloth.com/zh/privacy-policy-chinese/'>隐私政策</link>，详细了解我们的隐私处理方法。您可以在“数据”下管理《Among Us》的个人数据设置。

zh.GameOverImpostorKills: 正常来说，由于船员已经无法胜利，伪装者会获胜，但在练习模式中，我们会改为复活所有人。
zh.GameOverTaskWin: 正常来说，由于任务计量条已满，船员会获胜，但在练习模式中，我们会改为发布新任务。
zh.GameOverSabotage: 正常来说，伪装者会因为做出重大破坏直接获胜，但我们改为阻止了破坏。

zh.RolesHelpIntro_02: 船员和伪装者都可以获得随机分配的角色，具体取决于主持人所选的游戏设置。
zh.RolesHelp_Scientist_01: 科学家可以随时使用便携式生命监测面板查看船员状态。
zh.RolesHelp_Scientist_02: 不过，该面板需要电力运行，因此科学家需要完成任务来给电池充电。
zh.RolesHelp_Engineer_01: 身为船员的工程师可使用通风口加速移动，还能当场抓到进出通风口的伪装者。
zh.RolesHelp_Engineer_02: 但您不能永远待在通风口里，那样会很可疑，因此，请小心通风口附近的人……
zh.RolesHelp_GuardianAngel_01: 守护天使是船员变成的鬼魂，可以短暂放出护盾保护其他活着的船员。
zh.RolesHelp_GuardianAngel_02: 把握好时机就能防止伪装者杀掉受害者。真是万幸！
zh.RolesHelp_Shapeshifter_01: 变形者可以改变容貌，伪装成其他船员。运用得当就能陷害其他船员，让人分不清谁才是真正的伪装者！
zh.RolesHelp_Shapeshifter_02: 但要小心，伪装不会永远保持，而且会留下证据。
zh.RolesHelpOutro_01: 角色支持自定义！游戏主持人可以选择工程师允许进出通风口的次数、变形者的冷却时间等等，还可以挑选其中某个角色在游戏中出现的百分比几率。在游戏大厅设置中，可以随时查看某个角色是否启用！
zh.RolesHelpOutro_02: 按照您的喜好调整设置来创建您的终极游戏大厅，或者加入某个大厅看看您能在其中如何搅弄风云。我们会为游戏添加新的角色，因此需要的时候随时回来看看吧。玩得开心！
zh.ProtectedRecently: 守护天使最近保护了某个人...
zh.ScientistBlurbMed:
随时使用生命监测能力。
完成任务即可充电。
zh.ScientistBlurbLong: 科学家可以随时使用便携式生命监测面板查看船员状态。不过，便携式生命监测面板需要充电，因此科学家需要完成任务才能充电。
zh.EngineerBlurbLong: 身为船员的工程师可使用通风口加速移动，也能当场抓到通风口的伪装者。您无法永远待在通风口里，因此请小心通风口附近的人...
zh.GuardianAngelBlurbLong: 守护天使是最先死亡的船员变成的鬼魂。可以短暂放出护盾保护其他活着的船员。抓好时机就能就能防止伪装者杀掉受害者。真是万幸！
zh.ShapeshifterBlurbMed: 变身成其他船员来伪装自己。
zh.ShapeshifterBlurbLong: 变形者可以改变容貌，伪装成其他船员。运用得当能陷害其他船员，并混淆伪装者真正的身份。但要小心，伪装不会永远保持，而且会留下证据。
zh.OracleBlurb: 能确认其中一名船员的非伪装者身份
zh.OracleBlurbMed: 能确认其中一名船员的非伪装者身份。
zh.OracleBlurbLong: 先知船员可以确认其中一名船员并非伪装者

您已登录游客账号！

所有已取得的经验值、舱室及豆豆只能应用于此游客账号。游客账号仅会与您的实体设备链接，更换设备将无法继续使用此账号。

如果您与其他人共享此设备 (电脑、手机等等)，请留意此游客账号是所有使用此设备的人共享的。如果您选择继续，未来此设备上的其他用户将无法合并此游客账号，因为此游客账号只可进行一次合并。您将无法再次重新分配已链接到此游客账号的物品、货币与纪录。

zh.AccountDeleteHelp:
按下“确认”即表明您请求删除您在《Among Us》中的所有数据。此请求将需要 7-14 天，并将导致所有的星星、经验值、豆豆、豆荚和购买的外观被删除。一旦您的账号被完全删除，我们将无法恢复。在删除过程完成之前，您的账号将可以正常使用。

如果遇到任何错误，请联系 support@innersloth.com。
zh.AccountUnDeleteHelp:
按下“确认”即表明您要求中止删除账号。如果想删除账号，您需要再次提交申请。

如果遇到任何错误，请联系 support@innersloth.com。

zh.TagFiltersHelpFindGame: 你可以通过从筛选下拉列表中选择标签来筛选游戏搜索。你选择的筛选将与搜索结果完全匹配。\n 例如：如果你选择休闲和专家，那么将只能找到同时使用休闲与专家筛选标签的游戏。
zh.TagFiltersHelpCreate: 你可以使用筛选为游戏加上标签，帮助玩家找到你的游戏。你选择的筛选将与搜索结果完全匹配。 例如：如果你选择休闲和专家，那么只有同时筛选搜索休闲和专家才可以看到你的游戏。
zh.FindGameNeedsRefresh:
筛选设置已更改

请刷新
zh.NewModeInfo: 在这个惊心动魄的模式里，你必须玩命才能胜利！ 但是别着急，这可不是普通的捉迷藏......
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayPageOne: 船员：完成任务，推进计时，避开伪装者，坚持活下来，直到时间结束。 伪装者：找到船员，杀掉他们。
zh.HideSeekHowToPlaySubtextOne: 这里没有讨论和推理，只有惊声尖叫。
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayCrewmateInfoOne: 掌握躲藏和偷袭技能才能生存下去。
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayCrewmateInfoTwo: 该模式下，你可以使用通风口，还能得到一个高科技的威胁指示器，当伪装者靠近时，你就会获得提醒。伪装者的视野有限，所以用你的智慧、通风口和指示器来躲开他们！
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayImpostorInfoOne: 该模式下，伪装者无法进入通风口，所以你需要快速行动才能抓住猎物。四周一片漆黑！还好，你有手电筒可以帮你找到下一个受害者。
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayFinalHide:
这是最最最后的终局对决。在游戏的最后时刻，伪装者的能力会获得提升：他们的速度更快，还会得到特殊的搜索地图，能够定位到幸存船员的所在位置。\n
要想获胜，就要机动灵活，有策略地逃跑！
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightMobile: 使用屏幕右侧的手电筒模拟摇杆指引光束，杀死你能找到的所有船员！
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightDefault: 使用鼠标指引手电筒光束，杀死你能找到的所有船员！
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightConsoles: 使用右摇杆指引光束，杀死你能找到的所有船员！
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightPlayStation: 使用右操作杆指引光束，杀死你能找到的所有船员！
zh.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightSwitch: 使用 R 摇杆指引光束，杀死你能找到的所有船员！

如果这种情形频繁发生，您的设备可能过于老旧，或者未达到最低规格要求。请尝试在其他设备上游玩。

zh.GamePresetsDescription: 为游戏大厅应用推荐设置。
zh.GamePresetsPopupText: 你对游戏设置所做的更改将还原为默认选项！
zh.StandardRulesPresetDescription: 玩法平衡的游戏预设，且没有设置角色。
zh.RolesRulesPresetDescription: 适用于已设置角色的大厅的推荐设置。
zh.StandardRulesPresetDescriptionHideAndSee: 完美的捉迷藏预设，关闭了手电筒视野。
zh.FlashlightRulesPresetDescription: 船员拥有手电筒视野，且游戏平衡性经过了调整的预设。
zh.GameSettingsDescription: 为游戏大厅编辑个人设置。
zh.RoleSettingsDescription: 为游戏大厅编辑角色设置。
zh.NoisemakerBlurbMed: 被杀时通知所有船员你的遇害位置。
zh.NoisemakerBlurbLong: 大嗓门并非常规的船员角色。与其他角色不同，大嗓门没有可以主动使用的技能。不过，该角色在被伪装者杀害时，会自动发出警报，顿时让伪装者手足无措。接下来就看你的船员同伴们冲向犯罪现场，抓捕罪犯，为你报仇雪恨吧！
zh.PhantomBlurbMed: 隐形可以自由潜行或是避免被杀。
zh.PhantomBlurbLong: 幻象师可以隐匿行踪，暗中跟踪一名船员或是神不知鬼不觉地离开犯罪现场。幻象师在隐形时无法杀人，但依然可以使用梯子和滑索。隐形或现形时都会产生一大团烟雾，因此务必确保周围区域没有任何船员在场！隐形也不会持续太长时间，所以要挑选合适的时机善加利用。
zh.TrackerBlurb: 使用你的地图追踪一名船员
zh.TrackerBlurbMed: 在一名船员身上放置一枚追踪器，并使用地图查看其动向。
zh.TrackerBlurbLong: 侦察员可以用其小地图查看一名船员的位置。不过在此之前，侦察员必须来到该船员身边并安放追踪装置。当靠近别人时，千万别表现得太过可疑了。追踪只能生效一小段时间，因此要小心选择你的目标。另外，盯着小地图时别太出神了，以防伪装者趁虚而入！
zh.RolesHelp_Noisemaker_01: 大嗓门并非常规的船员角色。与其他角色不同，大嗓门没有可以主动使用的技能。不过，该角色在被伪装者杀害时，会自动发出警报。
zh.RolesHelp_Noisemaker_02: 警报会顿时让伪装者手足无措。接下来就看你的船员同伴们冲向犯罪现场，抓捕罪犯，为你报仇雪恨吧！
zh.RolesHelp_Tracker_01: 侦察员可以用其小地图查看一名船员的位置。不过在此之前，侦察员必须来到该船员身边并安放追踪装置。当靠近别人时，千万别表现得太过可疑了。
zh.RolesHelp_Tracker_02: 追踪只能生效一小段时间，因此要小心选择你的目标。另外，盯着小地图时别太出神了，以防伪装者趁虚而入！
zh.RolesHelp_Phantom_01: 幻象师可以隐匿行踪，暗中跟踪一名船员或是神不知鬼不觉地离开犯罪现场。幻象师在隐形时无法杀人，但依然可以使用梯子和滑索。
zh.RolesHelp_Phantom_02: 隐形或现形时都会产生一大团烟雾，因此务必确保周围区域没有任何船员在场！隐形也不会持续太长时间，所以要挑选合适的时机善加利用。
zh.GuardianNewPermissionUpdate:
自游戏的 {0} 版本起，根据新的儿童安全法律的要求，所有儿童账号需要家长或监护人授权才能完全访问《Among Us》。您的游戏数据和物品未受影响，但您的账号必须先经过审核才能完全访问。

在您的父母或监护人授权前，您可以继续使用临时受限账号游玩。如果您的账号已附带父母或监护人的电子邮件，则将显示在下方。

en.GhostDoTasks: You're dead. Finish your tasks to win.
en.GhostImpostor: You're dead. You can still sabotage.
en.HowToPlayText1:
Among Us is a game of teamwork and betrayal.

Players are either Crewmates or an Impostor.
en.HowToPlayText2: Play with 4 to 15 players online or via local WiFi!
en.HowToPlayText41: If you already have an Among Us account on another platform, you may be able to link to that account! Alternatively, you can create a brand new account.
en.HowToPlayText42:
Firstly, determine who you want to play with!

If you want to play with friends online, set to 'private' and share the room code.

If you want to play with others from all around the world, set to 'public'.
en.HowToPlayText43: Want to play with more tasks? How about faster walk speed? More Impostors? As host, you can change these settings. Be sure to confirm the changes with your fellow players.
en.HowToPlayText44: If someone is being rude and/or spamming, hosts can temporarily kick players as a warning or ban players from the specific online room.
en.HowToPlayTextMap: Players have access to a personal map to help them navigate the ship.
en.HowToPlayTextCrew1: Objective: Fill Group Task Bar or Discover the Impostor.
en.HowToPlayTextCrew4: Call emergency meeting when Impostor found.
en.HowToPlayTextCrew6: Check Admin Map and Security for suspicious activity.
en.HowToPlayTextImp5: Sabotage the ship and confuse the Crew.
en.HowToPlayTextImp7: Kill off the Crew between cooldowns.
en.HowToPlayText5:
While playing in person, no talking is allowed to keep the game fair between The Crew and The Impostor.

If a player is killed by The Impostor, they cannot talk until the game ends.

Ghosts still run their assigned tasks working towards a possible Crewmates win.
en.HowToPlayText6:
When someone reports a dead body or calls an emergency meeting, the Crew gathers to discuss what they know about the Impostor.

Players can now talk openly about who they think the Impostor is and what information they have. When playing in person, Ghosts cannot talk as they already know who the Impostor is.

Impostors will try to prove their innocence or accuse another crew member.
en.HowToPlayText7:
After discussion, vote for who you think is the Impostor.

Whoever gets majority votes will be ejected from the ship, so vote wisely!

If you don't have enough information and have decided as a Crew, you can also skip voting to avoid ejecting someone innocent and gather more information.
en.HowToPlayText82: Set your own tasks as a Crew member or practice your Impostor killing strategies!
en.LocalHelp:
Connection trubz?

● Make sure everyone is connected to the same WiFi name
● Make sure everyone has the same version (in the bottom right)
● Make sure your WiFi's signal is strong
● Sometimes another person hosting helps
● Sometimes restarting the app helps...
● Sometimes restarting your phone helps...
● Still having problems? Let us know by reaching out to support@innersloth.com!
en.OnlineHelp:
How does this work?

● Hosting a game gives you a game code in the lobby panel.
● Share the game code with friends to create a private room.
● Or tap 'Private' to make the room public for 'Find Game'.
● The host can ban or kick players whenever chat is available.
● Still having problems? Let us know by reaching out to support@innersloth.com!

en.AdPolicyText: Can we use your personal data to tailor ads for you? If you click yes, our advertising partners such as Google AdMob and Unity Ads will automatically collect data and use device identifiers and cookies for ad personalization. If you click no, you may still see non-personalized ads. To remove all ads, purchase the no-ad upgrade [httpstore]here[], and you and your friends will get no ads whenever you host! To learn more about our and our advertising partners' privacy practices, please see our [https://www.innersloth.com/privacy-policy/]Privacy Policy[]. You can change your decision at any time in the settings menu under 'Data'.
en.PrivacyPolicyText:
Innersloth processes personal data for Among Us. Please read our <link='https://www.innersloth.com/privacy-policy/'>Privacy Policy</link> to learn more about our privacy practices. You can manage your personal data settings for Among Us under 'Data'.

Please read our <link='https://www.innersloth.com/terms-of-use-for-the-games/'>Terms of Use</link> before playing Among Us.
en.GameOverImpostorDead: Normally The Crew would have just won because The Impostor is dead. For Practice, we revive everyone instead.

en.GameOverTaskWin: Normally The Crew would have just won because the task bar is full. For Practice, we issue new tasks instead.
en.GameOverSabotage: Normally The Impostor would have just won because of the critical sabotage. Instead we just shut it off.

en.RolesHelpIntro_01: Roles add a whole new level of deception and strategy to the classic game!
en.RolesHelpIntro_02: Both Crewmates and Impostors can have roles assigned to them randomly, depending on the game settings chosen by the host.
en.RolesHelp_Scientist_01: The Scientist can access a portable vitals panel anywhere to check on the status of the crew.
en.RolesHelp_Scientist_02: However the panel needs to be charged, so the Scientist will need to complete tasks in order to fill the battery.
en.RolesHelp_Engineer_01: The Engineer is a Crewmate that can use vents to move around quicker, as well as catch venting Impostors in the act.
en.RolesHelp_Engineer_02: You can't stay in there forever though and it's pretty suspicious, so be careful of who you vent around...
en.RolesHelp_GuardianAngel_01: The Guardian Angel is the ghost of a Crewmate. They can temporarily shield and protect other living Crewmates.
en.RolesHelp_GuardianAngel_02: Time it properly and you'll be able to prevent Impostors from killing their victim. Lucky!
en.RolesHelp_Shapeshifter_01: The Shapeshifter can change their appearance and disguise themselves as other Crewmates. Do it well to frame other Crewmates and create confusion over who the real Impostor is!
en.RolesHelp_Shapeshifter_02: But watch out - the disguise doesn't last forever and leaves evidence behind.
en.RolesHelpOutro_01: Roles are customizable! Game hosts can choose how many times an Engineer can vent, Shapeshifter cooldown, etc. They can also pick the percentage chance of one of these roles occurring in the game. You can always see if a role is turned on in the game lobby settings!
en.RolesHelpOutro_02: Play around with the settings you like best to make your ultimate lobby, or join one and see what chaos you can cause there. We may add new roles to the game, so check back here whenever you need to! Have fun!
en.ProtectedRecently: The Guardian Angel protected someone recently...
en.ScientistBlurbMed:
Access vitals at anytime.
Complete tasks to recharge your battery.
en.ScientistBlurbLong: The Scientist can access a portable vitals panel anywhere to check on the status of the crew. However the portable vitals panel needs to be charged, so the Scientist will need to complete tasks in order to fill the battery.
en.EngineerBlurbLong: The Engineer is a Crewmate who can use vents to move around quicker, as well as catch venting Impostors in the act. You can't stay in there forever though, so be careful of who you vent around...
en.GuardianAngelBlurbMed: Cast protection shield around the remaining crew.
en.GuardianAngelBlurbLong: The Guardian Angel is the ghost of the first dead Crewmate. They can temporarily shield and protect other living Crewmates. Time it properly and you'll be able to prevent Impostors from killing their victim. Lucky!
en.ShapeshifterBlurbMed: Disguise yourself by morphing into other Crewmates.
en.ShapeshifterBlurbLong: The Shapeshifter can change their appearance and disguise themselves as other Crewmates. Do it well to frame other Crewmates and create confusion about who the real Impostor is. But watch out - the disguise doesn't last forever and leaves evidence behind.
en.OracleBlurb: Knows of one Crewmate who is not an Impostor
en.OracleBlurbMed: Knows of one Crewmate who is not an Impostor.
en.OracleBlurbLong: The Oracle is a Crewmate who knows for certain that one Crewmate is not an Impostor

en.RuleOneCrewmates:
Survive until time runs out.
Finishing tasks reduce the timer.
en.RuleTwoCrewmates: Use vents and the Danger Meter to hide!
en.RuleThreeCrewmates: After the timer is up, the Impostor can track you!
en.RuleOneImpostor: Kill all Crewmates within the time limit!
en.RuleTwoImpostor: Act fast - you have limited vision and no access to vents.
en.RuleThreeImpostor: In the final moments, you get a speed boost and tracking hints!
en.TagFiltersHelpFindGame: You can filter game searches by selecting tags from the Filters dropdown list. Filters you select will match the search results exactly. Example: If you select Casual and Expert you will only find games tagged with both Casual and Expert filters.
en.TagFiltersHelpCreate: You can tag your game with filters to help players find your game. Filters you select will match the search results exactly. Example: If you select Casual and Expert only people who search for both Casual and Expert filters will see your game.
en.NewModeInfo: The stakes are high in this heart-stopping game mode! But wait - it's not your ordinary Hide n Seek...
en.HideSeekHowToPlayPageOne: Crewmates: Complete tasks to speed up the clock, avoid the Impostor, and stay alive until the timer runs out. The Impostor: Find the Crewmates and go on a killing spree.
en.HideSeekHowToPlaySubtextOne: No social deduction here, just terrified screaming.
en.HideSeekHowToPlayCrewmateInfoOne: Master your hiding and sneaking skills in order to survive.
en.HideSeekHowToPlayCrewmateInfoTwo: In this mode you can use vents and get a high-tech Danger Meter that alerts you when the Impostor is getting closer. The Impostor has a limited range of vision, so use your wits, vents, and visors to dodge them!
en.HideSeekHowToPlayImpostorInfoOne: Impostors can't vent in this mode, so you'll need to act fast to catch your prey. It's dark out there! Luckily you have a Flashlight to help you find your next victims.
en.HideSeekHowToPlayFinalHide:
It's the finaaaal countdownnnn. In the last moments of the game, the Impostor gets a power boost - they're faster, get a special Seek map, and a directional ping to where any surviving Crewmates are.

Think fast and run away strategically to win!
en.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightMobile: Use the Flashlight virtual joystick on the right side of your screen to direct your beam and kill all the Crewmates you can find!
en.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightDefault: Use your mouse to direct your Flashlight beam and kill all the Crewmates you can find!
en.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightConsoles: Use the Right Stick to direct your beam and kill all the Crewmates you can find!
en.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightPlayStation: Use the Right Stick to direct your beam and kill all the Crewmates you can find!
en.HideSeekHowToPlayFlashlightSwitch: Use the Right Stick to direct your beam and kill all the Crewmates you can find!

en.AnnouncementErrorText:
Looks like something went wrong. Please make sure your game is online and updated to the latest version in order to get all of the latest Among Us information and fixes.

If you continue to have issues, send us a support ticket at support@innersloth.com.

Something went wrong when finalizing your Among Us account. Please try again or continue on a guest account. All progress will be saved, but we recommend setting up an account so you can fully enjoy all of the features in Among Us.

Retry account setup?

Do you have a pre-existing Among Us account? (Also known as an Epic Online Services account.)

If you have played Among Us on this device before, select 'Yes'.

Uh oh! Something went wrong sending the Guardian Permissions email. Please try again or continue in offline mode.

Try again?
en.MissingGuardianEmailText: Your account is missing a guardian email address. We need to ask your guardian (via e-mail) for permission to continue. If they say yes, you will be able to use free chat online and change your username. Ask an adult to help you with this!
en.ReportNotificationHeader: Thank you for helping to keep Among Us a safe and friendly place!
en.ReportNotificationBody: Our moderation team will review the information you reported and take action as appropriate based on our Code of Conduct.
en.ErrorClientTimeout:
You disconnected from the server. This could be due to server issues, network issues or device issues. Check your network strength.

If this happens often, your device may be too old or not reaching the minimum spec requirements. Try playing on a different device.
en.ErrorClientTimeoutConsole: You disconnected from the server. This could be due to server issues or network issues. Check your network strength.

en.QCSelfGoingToNoisemaker: I was going to the Noisemaker
en.NoisemakerBlurb: Send out an alert when killed
en.NoisemakerBlurbMed: Alert all Crewmates of your location when killed.
en.NoisemakerBlurbLong: The Noisemaker is no ordinary Crewmate role. They don’t have an ability to use like all other roles. Instead, they automatically send out an alert when they are killed by an Impostor. The alert easily sends the Impostor into a panic. Watch your fellow Crewmates rush to the scene of the crime to catch the killer and avenge your death!
en.PhantomBlurbMed: Turn invisible to sneak around or get away from a kill.
en.PhantomBlurbLong: The Phantom can turn invisible to stealthily sneak up to a Crewmate or leave the scene of a crime without getting caught. They can’t kill while invisible, but they can still use ladders and ziplines. Turning invisible and vice versa creates a big smoke cloud so make sure no Crewmates are in the area! The invisibility also doesn’t last forever so make sure to time the ability right.
en.TrackerBlurb: Track a Crewmate with your map
en.TrackerBlurbMed:
Plant a tracker on a Crewmate to watch
their movements on the map.
en.TrackerBlurbLong: The Tracker can see the position of a Crewmate on their minimap. They first have to be beside another Crewmate to plant the tracking device. Be careful not to look too suspicious while approaching the other Crewmate. Tracking only lasts a few seconds so make sure to choose a target carefully. Also don’t get caught staring at the minimap too long as that leaves you vulnerable to an Impostor!
en.RolesHelp_Noisemaker_01: The Noisemaker is no ordinary Crewmate role. They don’t have an ability to use like all other roles. Instead, they automatically send out an alert when they are killed by an Impostor.
en.RolesHelp_Noisemaker_02: The alert easily sends the Impostor into a panic. Watch your fellow Crewmates rush to the scene of the crime to catch the killer and avenge your death!

en.GuardianNewPermissionUpdate:
As of game version {0}, due to requirements set by new child safety laws, all Child Accounts need a parent or guardian to grant permission to fully access Among Us. Your game data and items have not been affected, but your account must be reviewed before you can fully access it.

You may continue to play on a temporary restricted account until your parent or guardian grants permission. If there is already a parent or guardian email attached to your account, it will appear below.
